dotProduct(Vector2D, Vector2D) - Static method in class inra.ijpb.geometry.Vector2D
Computes the dot product of two vectors, defined by: x1 * x2 + y1 * y2 Dot product is zero if the vectors are orthogonal.
dotProduct(Vector3D, Vector3D) - Static method in class inra.ijpb.geometry.Vector3D
Computes the dot product of two vectors, defined by: x1 * x2 + y1 * y2 + z1 * z2 Dot product is zero if the vectors are orthogonal.
